articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: WHO Expects More Cases of Monkeypox to Emerge Globally - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: So far it’s been reported in 12 countries that are not endemic for the virus
articles.content:
LONDON  The World Health Organization said it expects to identify more cases of monkeypox as it expands surveillance in countries where the disease is not typically found.
As of Saturday, 92 confirm… [+2641 chars]
